channel.title: [error] null folder?
channel.description:
When I start my server up, it throws up this error: [code] runserver: [java] 17 NPC Scripts loaded! [java] Loading Banned IP Addressess [java] [java] [java] Banned IP Addresses Loaded Successfully [java] Today is Tuesday. The wilderness is P2P [java] folder null [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.clansystem.ClanHandler.loadClans(ClanHandler.java:26) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.clansystem.ClanHandler.<init>(ClanHandler.java:18) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<init>(Server.java:380) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.button1ActionPerformed(GUI.java:163) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.access$000(GUI.java:31) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI$2.actionPerformed(GUI.java:670) [java] at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2012) [java] at javax.swing.AbstractButton$Handler.actionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2335) [java] at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.fireActionPerformed(DefaultButtonModel.java:404) [java] at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.setPressed(DefaultButtonModel.java:259) [java] at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicButtonListener.mouseReleased(BasicButtonListener.java:253) [java] at java.awt.Component.processMouseEvent(Component.java:6175) [java] at javax.swing.JComponent.processMouseEvent(JComponent.java:3267) [java] at java.awt.Component.processEvent(Component.java:5940) [java] at java.awt.Container.processEvent(Container.java:2105) [java] at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Component.java:4536) [java] at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2163) [java] at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4362) [java] at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.retargetMouseEvent(Container.java:4461) [java] at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.processMouseEvent(Container.java:4125) [java] at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.dispatchEvent(Container.java:4055) [java] at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2149) [java] at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:2478) [java] at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4362) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:604) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThread.java:275) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.java:200) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThread.java:190) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:185) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:177) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:138)
[/code] I'm running Ubuntu btw but dont be discouraged. I'm sure this problem is has to do with the location of the folders (Windows = C:\WINDOWS Ubuntu = /root)

item.title: [error] null folder?
item.dc:creator: @Kurisu Kurisu
item.description:
@Kurisu wrote:

When I start my server up, it throws up this error:

runserver:
     [java] 17 NPC Scripts loaded! 
     [java] Loading Banned IP Addressess
     [java] 
     [java] 
     [java] Banned IP Addresses Loaded Successfully
     [java] Today is Tuesday. The wilderness is P2P
     [java] folder null
     [java] java.lang.NullPointerException
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.clansystem.ClanHandler.loadClans(ClanHandler.java:26)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.clansystem.ClanHandler.<init>(ClanHandler.java:18)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<init>(Server.java:380)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.button1ActionPerformed(GUI.java:163)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.access$000(GUI.java:31)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI$2.actionPerformed(GUI.java:670)
     [java] 	at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2012)
     [java] 	at javax.swing.AbstractButton$Handler.actionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2335)
     [java] 	at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.fireActionPerformed(DefaultButtonModel.java:404)
     [java] 	at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.setPressed(DefaultButtonModel.java:259)
     [java] 	at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicButtonListener.mouseReleased(BasicButtonListener.java:253)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Component.processMouseEvent(Component.java:6175)
     [java] 	at javax.swing.JComponent.processMouseEvent(JComponent.java:3267)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Component.processEvent(Component.java:5940)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Container.processEvent(Container.java:2105)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Component.java:4536)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2163)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4362)
     [java] 	at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.retargetMouseEvent(Container.java:4461)
     [java] 	at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.processMouseEvent(Container.java:4125)
     [java] 	at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.dispatchEvent(Container.java:4055)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2149)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:2478)
     [java] 	at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4362)
     [java] 	at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:604)
     [java] 	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThread.java:275)
     [java] 	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.java:200)
     [java] 	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThread.java:190)
     [java] 	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:185)
     [java] 	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:177)
     [java] 	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:138)

I’m running Ubuntu btw but dont be discouraged. I’m sure this problem is has to do with the location of the folders
(Windows = C:\WINDOWS
Ubuntu = /root)
